sub-list.name: Installation
sub-list.code:
npm install -g @angular/cli
ng new my-dream-app
cd my-dream-app
ng serve

sub-list.name: Shopping Website
sub-list.code:
1. Login

2. Installing a theme

theme name : Astra

to import the sample site : Astra Options > Import startup site > see Library > Elementor > ecommerce > choose site Brandstore > Install plugins > Import the site


3.

Delete all products

 Dashboard > Products > select all products > Move to trash > Apply

Add new product

Products > Add new
